entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
